issue.title: Service compliance in SERVICE
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Two points in SERVICE component:
- in com_easysdi_service\src\administrator\helpers\easysdi_service.php : the lowest compliant version is used instead of higher.
- in com_easysdi_service\src\administrator\helpers\PhysicalService.php : the compliance is not loaded, so request are made without versions in policy screens

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
